attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
our
country have given everyone the right to have freedom of speech BUT we are strongly against the online hate game regaidng Prophet Muhammad as this will cause many propblems in the uk.  Our goverment should do everything possible in terms of baning the online game in this country. Thank you very much for your time

rejection.details:
We believe there is a similar petition already online. http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/StopHate/

If you believe your petition is significantly different to the one found at the link above, please resubmit and we will accept.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
